APP.NAME: Car Service
ABOUT_US.TITLE: Transparency. Trust. Peace of Mind.
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: At AVTO REVOLUCIJA, transparency and fairness are not just values‚Äîthey are the foundation of our business. We follow global automotive standards that prioritize honesty, clarity, and customer trust, and we put these principles into practice. Our mission is simple: to provide our customers with confidence and peace of mind at every stage of ownership.
ABOUT_US.SELECTED_VEHICLES_TEXT1: We offer a refined selection of vehicles from the Volkswagen Group, chosen for their quality, reliability, and proven performance.
ABOUT_US.SELECTED_VEHICLES_TEXT2: Each vehicle is thoroughly inspected and prepared to meet high technical standards before being offered for sale.
ABOUT_US.SELECTED_VEHICLES_TEXT3: To ensure a smooth and effortless purchase experience, we also assist with financing and insurance solutions. Upon request, we can arrange vehicle imports from abroad, giving our customers access to a wider range of premium options.
ABOUT_US.COMMITMENT_TITLE: More Than a Sale ‚Äì A Long-Term Commitment
ABOUT_US.COMMITMENT_TEXT1: We understand that purchasing a used vehicle is only the beginning. The most important moments often come after the purchase, which is why we place exceptional focus on after-sales support.
ABOUT_US.COMMITMENT_TEXT2: At AVTO REVOLUCIJA, our responsibility does not end when the keys are handed over-we remain your trusted partner long after the purchase.
ABOUT_US.SERVICE_CENTER_TITLE: Dedicated Service Center for Our Customers
ABOUT_US.SERVICE_CENTER_TEXT1: To deliver on this promise, we have established our own service center and showroom, where priority is always given to AVTO REVOLUCIJA customers.
ABOUT_US.SERVICE_CENTER_TEXT2: Our workshop is equipped with advanced diagnostic systems specialized for the Volkswagen Group, enabling precise, manufacturer-focused servicing and expert care. This level of technical capability ensures transparency, accuracy, and long-term vehicle reliability.
ABOUT_US.BENEFITS_SUBTITLE: Every customer who purchases a vehicle with us receives:
ABOUT_US.BENEFIT_1: Free basic diagnostic checks for up to 5 years after purchase
ABOUT_US.BENEFIT_2: A permanent 10% discount on all mechanical services performed by our service center
ABOUT_US.BENEFITS_FOOTNOTE: These benefits are designed to protect your investment and ensure a worry-free ownership experience.
ABOUT_US.LIFELONG_DISCOUNT_TEXT: We believe in long-term relationships with our clients. That's why every customer who purchases a car from AVTO REVOLUCIJA enjoys a lifelong 10% discount on all mechanical services for that vehicle. This is our way of saying thank you for your trust and ensuring your car remains in peak condition for years to come.
ABOUT_US.COMPLETE_EXPERIENCE_TEXT: By combining a premium vehicle selection, transparent business practices, and unmatched after-sales support, AVTO REVOLUCIJA delivers more than just a car - we offer a complete ownership experience built on trust, expertise, and long-term care.
ABOUT_US.OUR_STORY_PARAGRAPH1: AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o. combines professionalism, trust, and customer dedication.
ABOUT_US.OUR_STORY_PARAGRAPH2: Our goal is to provide high-quality used vehicles at fair prices ‚Äì with no hidden costs and full documentation. In cooperation with trusted partners across the EU, we deliver verified cars with a transparent history.
ABOUT_US.QUALITY_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: We use only the highest quality parts and provide thorough, professional service for every vehicle.
ABOUT_US.RELIABILITY_DESCRIPTION: You can count on us to deliver on time, every time. Your schedule is important to us.
ABOUT_US.TRANSPARENCY_DESCRIPTION: We believe in clear communication and honest pricing. No surprises, just honest service.
ABOUT_US.COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTION: We're proud to be part of this community and committed to supporting our local customers.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_MEMBER1_DESCRIPTION: With over 20 years of experience, Atanas serves as the lead mechanic, personally overseeing all technical work to ensure precision, reliability, and the highest service standards.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_MEMBER3_DESCRIPTION: Vane founded the business with a clear vision to combine transparent vehicle sales with honest and reliable automotive service.
ABOUT_US.MODERN_EQUIPMENT_DESCRIPTION: We use state-of-the-art diagnostic tools and equipment for accurate service.
ABOUT_US.WARRANTY_COVERAGE_DESCRIPTION: All our work comes with comprehensive warranty protection for your peace of mind.
ABOUT_US.CUSTOMER_SATISFACTION_DESCRIPTI: Your satisfaction is our priority. We stand behind our work 100%.

FOOTER.ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: Providing top-notch car services. Your trusted partner for all automotive needs.
HOME.SLIDER1_TEXT: Discover our carefully selected pre-owned vehicles, each inspected and repaired to the highest standards. Drive away with confidence knowing you're getting a quality car with warranty protection.
HOME.SLIDER2_TEXT: Our certified mechanics provide comprehensive automotive repairs with extended warranty coverage. From oil changes to engine rebuilds, we've got you covered.
HOME.SLIDER3_TEXT: Join many satisfied customers who trust us with their automotive needs. Experience the difference that quality service and warranty-backed repairs make.
HOME.HEADLINE: Your partner for importing, selling, and servicing used vehicles.
HOME.SUBTEXT_1: At AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o., we make sure you find a reliable car at a fair price ‚Äì with no hidden costs and all the necessary documentation.
HOME.SUBTEXT_2: AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o. is your trusted partner in finding quality used vehicles ‚Äì fair prices, transparent history, and no surprises.
HOME.MARKETING_FRIENDLY: Find your reliable car with AVTO REVOLUCIJA d.o.o. ‚Äì fair price, no hidden costs, full documentation
HOME.CAR_SALES_DESCRIPTION: Quality pre-owned vehicles with warranty protection for Volkswagen Group vehicles ‚Äì Volkswagen, Audi, ≈†koda, and SEAT.
HOME.MECHANICAL_REPAIRS_DESCRIPTION: Expert repairs with extended warranty coverage
HOME.QUICK_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: Oil changes, brake service, and routine maintenance
HOME.LIFELONG_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Every car purchased from us comes with lifelong perks, including a permanent 10% discount on all services and free diagnostics.
HOME.EXTENDED_WARRANTY_DESCRIPTION: All our services come with industry-leading warranty periods for your peace of mind.
HOME.CERTIFIED_TECHNICIANS_DESCRIPTION: Certified mechanics with years of experience and ongoing training
HOME.QUICK_TURNAROUND_DESCRIPTION: Efficient service without compromising quality. Get back on the road faster.
HOME.FAIR_PRICING_DESCRIPTION: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Quality service at competitive rates.
HOME.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Contact us today for all your automotive needs. We're here to help!
HOME.REVIEW1_TEXT: Excellent experience! My Volkswagen Golf feels like new after the service. The transparency regarding the work done was exceptional.
HOME.REVIEW2_TEXT: I'm very satisfied with my ≈†koda purchase. The history was fully documented, and the price was fair. A truly professional team.
HOME.REVIEW3_TEXT: Outstanding service for my Audi. They diagnosed the issue quickly and provided a 10% discount as a returning customer. Highly recommended!
HOME.REVIEW4_TEXT: The best place for Volkswagen Group vehicles. Fast, honest, and reliable service. I've been coming here for years and they never disappoint.
HOME.REVIEW5_TEXT: Professional and transparent. They provided a detailed diagnostic report for my SEAT. No hidden costs, just honest work.
HOME.REVIEW6_TEXT: Imported a vehicle through them and couldn't be happier. They handled all the paperwork and the car is exactly as described. Top notch!
